entry.summary: 7 月 30 日，以太坊主网正式上线 8 周年。2015 年 7 月 30 日，以太坊主网正式上线并产生创始区块，创始区块的区块奖励为 5 ETH。据 TokenView 数据，目前以太坊的总交易数已超20.5 亿Txns，持币地址数达 6612 万个，总流通量 4722 万枚，总销毁量约 298.6 万枚。https://eth.tokenview.io/cn/

entry.title: RT Willy Woo: Price action has largely been dominated by demand stemming from the calendar futures markets, the instrument of pros and institutions. E...
entry.summary: RT Willy Woo Price action has largely been dominated by demand stemming from the calendar futures markets, the instrument of pros and institutions. Even now, demand keeps surging, suggesting we are in the early stages of another price squeeze.

entry.summary: 很多时候呢，不是不发东西自己干。 这熊市发这么多东西干嘛，都是亏钱的玩意。你也明白。 现在最重要的是苟住。 不要把自己赚不到钱的无能呻吟归因于别人不分享内容。 外卖我每天送着也美滋滋

entry.title: RT Mike Benz: Wow. Musk has no idea the DARPA rattlesnake he just stepped on by this doing this… My take on @elonmusk’s new rate limit policy, from ...
entry.summary:
RT Mike Benz Wow. Musk has no idea the DARPA rattlesnake he just stepped on by this doing this… My take on @elonmusk’s new rate limit policy, from the lens of the censorship industry:
Elon Musk: To address extreme levels of data scraping & system manipulation, we’ve applied the following temporary limits: - Verified accounts are limited to reading 6000 posts/day - Unverified accounts to 600 posts/day - New unverified accounts to 300/day
